mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MN_BK_WISH (ISBN13, ISBN, USER_ID, REG_DT) VALUES (#{isbn13}, #{isbn}, #{userId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE REG_DT = VALUES(REG_DT)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MN_BK_WISH w WHERE ( (#{isbn} IS NOT NULL AND #{isbn} != '' AND CONVERT(w.ISBN USING utf8mb4) = CONVERT(CAST(#{isbn} AS CHAR) USING utf8mb4)) OR (#{isbn13} IS NOT NULL AND #{isbn13} != '' AND CONVERT(w.ISBN13 USING utf8mb4) = CONVERT(CAST(#{isbn13} AS CHAR) USING utf8mb4)) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MN_BK_WISH w WHERE w.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ( (#{isbn} IS NOT NULL AND #{isbn} != '' AND CONVERT(w.ISBN USING utf8mb4) = CONVERT(CAST(#{isbn} AS CHAR) USING utf8mb4)) OR (#{isbn13} IS NOT NULL AND #{isbn13} != '' AND CONVERT(w.ISBN13 USING utf8mb4) = CONVERT(CAST(#{isbn13} AS CHAR) USING utf8mb4)) )

SELECT w.ISBN as isbn, w.ISBN13 as isbn13, w.REG_DT as regDt, m.TITLE as title, m.AUTHOR as author, m.PUBLISHER as publisher, m.COVER as cover FROM MN_BK_WISH w LEFT JOIN MN_BK_MST m ON ( (w.ISBN IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(w.ISBN USING utf8mb4) = CONVERT(m.ISBN USING utf8mb4)) OR (w.ISBN13 IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(w.ISBN13 USING utf8mb4) = CONVERT(m.ISBN13 USING utf8mb4)) ) WHERE w.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY w.REG_DT DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MN_MV_WISH (MV_ID, USER_ID, REG_DT) VALUES (#{mvId}, #{userId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE REG_DT = VALUES(REG_DT)
